verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: They] [V: call] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: the Trump whisperer] . France ’s President Emmanuel Macron – who believes his diplomacy , persuasion and personal charm can sway the thinking of his US counterpart , Donald Trump – arrives in Washington on Monday for the deeply symbolic first state visit by a foreign leader since Trump came to power.</p >

< p > They call him the Trump whisperer .
